name: Whispurr
overview:
Whispurr is real time messaging with SMS included and privacy policies to protect networks of people.

Whispurr is a social network service that prompts users to create social networks online similar to those they have offline. By creating realistic private networks based on your offline relationships you can maintain privacy. This means that your family won’t know what you do on Saturday nights and your friends won’t know how you’re getting on at work. Sometimes people get TMI !

Whispurr is incorporating SMS phone messaging from a user to a group of people offline and people offline will also be able to reply to user an online vis SMS. Whispurr allows users to create public networks too.

The Whispurr interface is similar to twitter but users can send 300 character messages in real time and the private networking effect will protect the privacy of individuals.
